Finally finished it! These are both decriptions of the settings, but
make sure you read both, as they describe different things. Once you
have read this and once you have received your NPC categories, feel
free to explore your world!

PS: I have given two people the Corrupt NPC category. This means that
both should consider forming two different (and perhaps rival) gangs.
Start thinking about how unique you'll make those!
